title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: In Build 200201151, when searching for references to a field in an external jar, the search results are not being selected. The specific step to reproduce this issue is as follows:
OB: The search results are not being selected when searching for references to the 'tmpFir' field in the 'java.io.File' class with the specified build.
EB: The search results should be automatically selected when searching for references to the 'tmpFir' field in the 'java.io.File' class with the specified build.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE (and that you have source for rt.jar)
2. Open java.io.File
3. Select the field 'tmpFir'
4. Perform a search for references to the selected field
